title: Ashe rework
body:
Hi all,

Just wanted to suggest that with the new ashe rework, and thinking about how ashe is a secondary support. if maybe her passive slow could be scaled off AP... its just a thought as I havent played her new kit, but i like the idea of her utility being scaled off AP and was wondering what other people thought of this

replies.body: I think this is a great idea, i love champs that can function one way through one build and function a completely different way (but still be viable) with a different build, e.g. ez, varus, shaco etc. so id love to see ashe like this too, however once something has been announced by riot, its basically finalised (stupid i know cos it means our feedback is pointless) but its unlikely that they will change it :( but in any case, you have my support! this is a great idea.
